landing.tagline: Private notes that stay private. Encrypted on your device, readable only by you.

encrypted.title: AES-256 Encryption
encrypted.description: Your note titles, tags, and content are encrypted before they ever touch storage.

local.title: Local-First
local.description: Runs entirely in your browser. No account needed to get started.

zeroKnowledge.title: You're in Control
zeroKnowledge.description: Only you can decrypt your notes. No exceptions.

encryption.title: What's encrypted?
encryption.description: Your note titles, content, and tags are encrypted with AES-256-GCM. Vault names are not encrypted so they can be displayed before unlock.

landing.disclaimer: Like any app, your security is only as strong as your browser. Keep it updated and use extensions you trust.

vault.selectDescription: Choose a vault to unlock, or create a new one
vault.noVaultsDescription: Get started by creating your first encrypted vault
vault.createDescription: Set up a secure encrypted vault for your notes
vault.vaultNameHint: Display name for your vault (not encrypted)

importDialog.title: Import Vault
importDialog.vaultNamePlaceholder: Leave empty to use original name

requirements.title: Password requirements:
requirements.mixCase: Mix of uppercase and lowercase letters

backup.title: Backup
backup.exportDescription: Download a backup of your vault. All data remains encrypted.

security.title: Security
security.changePasswordDescription: Update your vault password. All notes will be re-encrypted.
security.doNotClose: Please do not close this window...

warning.title: Important:
warning.reEncrypt: All notes will be re-encrypted with new keys
warning.noCancelNote: This process cannot be cancelled once started
warning.logoutNote: You'll be logged out after completion

autoLock.title: Auto-Lock
autoLock.inactivityDescription: Automatically lock the vault after a period of inactivity

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.deleteDescription: Permanently delete this vault and all its notes. This action cannot be undone.
dangerZone.deleteConfirmNotes: All {{count}} note will be permanently deleted
dangerZone.deleteConfirmNotes_plural: All {{count}} notes will be permanently deleted
dangerZone.deleteConfirmNoRecover: This vault cannot be recovered after deletion
dangerZone.deleteConfirmLogout: You will be logged out immediately

notes.title: Notes
notes.noNotesDescription: Start your secure note-taking journey by creating your first note. Your data is encrypted and stored locally.
notes.decryptingNotes: Decrypting your notes securely. This may take a moment.

tags.label: Tags
tags.hint: Press Enter to add a tag or select from suggestions

link.addDescription: Enter a URL to create a hyperlink.
link.editDescription: Update the URL for this link.

deleteNote.title: Delete Note
deleteNote.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this note?
deleteNote.warning: This action cannot be undone. The note will be permanently deleted.
